metadata.title: CVE-2022-25647 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The package com.google.code.gson:gson before 2.8.9 are vulnerable toDeserialization of Untrusted Data via the writeReplace() method in internalclasses, which may lead to DoS attacks.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-25647` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgoogle-gson-java - 2.4-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libgoogle-gson-java package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
